actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to abolish the National Capital Planning Commission and to transfer certain of its functions to the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Abolishes the Nationa Capital Planning Com- mission and transfers functions relating to the District of Columbia to the Government of the District of Columbia.

titles.title: A bill to abolish the National Capital Planning Commission and to transfer certain of its functions to the District of Columbia.
